changes.new: Veuillez également consulter la [politique relative aux cookies](https://www.amazon.fr/-/en/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=GVASXV5UZ64R4Y25) et la politique relative aux [publicités basées sur vos centres d'intérêt](https://www.amazon.fr/-/en/gp/help/customer/display.html?nodeId=G64JFZVFDY66XG9K).
changes.explanation: The updated policy indicates expanded tracking or behavioural analytics, including monitoring how you use the service (e.g., interactions, pages visited, search terms, click activity, or location) which may be used for personalization or profiling.
changes.suggested_action: Review privacy settings to limit tracking or analytics. Consider disabling personalised ads, restricting cookies, or using privacy tools if you are concerned about behavioural profiling.

changes.suggested_action: Read this part of the policy carefully to understand how it affects your data.
